Segment.name: H1
Segment.comment: To specify information relative to hazardous material

Field.name: HazardousMaterialCode
Field.comment: Code relating to hazardous material code qualifier for regulated hazardous materials

Field.name: HazardousMaterialClassCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the kind of hazard for a material

Field.name: HazardousMaterialCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code which qualifies the Hazardous Material Class Code (209)

Field.name: HazardousMaterialDescription
Field.comment: Material name, special instructions, and phone number if any

Field.name: HazardousMaterialContact
Field.comment: Phone number and name of person or department to contact in case of emergency

Field.name: HazardousMaterialsPage
Field.comment: The United Nations page number as required for the international transport of hazardous materials

Field.name: FlashpointTemperature
Field.comment: The flashpoint temperature for hazardous material

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: PackingGroupCode
Field.comment: Code indicating degree of danger in terms of Roman number I, II or III
